content: 2 6 times for total of 12 row loosely bobble in pattern finishing weave in all ends on ws using mattress stitch close cast- on edge by seaming the 3 sts on either side of the center st to one another block to measurements 3 visit follow share visit us follow us share with us 740 winslow way east #thelambandkid bainbridge island wa @thelambandkid and www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid #tlkbretonshawl the lamb & kid breton shawl version 1 // ©2022 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission
